revised_title: Motion of a Charged Black Hole in an Electromagnetic Field
tldr: The authors analyze the motion of a charged black hole in a weak, uniform electric field using the Hamiltonian formalism for coupled electromagnetic and gravitational perturbations of the Reissner-Nordstrom metric. They find that the black hole accelerates according to Newton's law and explain the relation of their approximate solution to Ernst's exact solution representing the charged-metric without nodal singularity.
